Reviews.Title: One Happy Customer
Reviews.Author: Mr. Michael S. Goodell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this kit a week ago and received it yesterday as expected.Pros: -Everything ordered arrived in one box -Everything ordered was received -Everything was on time -Everything was factory sealed and new -No damage to any equipment -Everything working correctlyCons: -If I had to create a 'con' it would be that I would like more shipping options to receive the equipment fasterI love my new camera. It's working  great.I will definitely look to this retailer first whenever I purchase new or upgraded equipment!

Reviews.Title: Great pack!!
Reviews.Author: Npyros
Reviews.Content: Loved the pack, and was really impressed with the camera body... Very complete and satisfying. Only con, the extra flash is really small, considering buying a bigger one.

Reviews.Title: The Need For The Book For Dummies!
Reviews.Author: Butch
Reviews.Content: I'm not a real camera buff, but I'm getting myself familiarized with all that came in the kit. The only thing that I'm really good at right now, is setting up the tripod!

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: PCavieresR
Reviews.Content: Very good product. It contains the minimum and necessary accesories for a professional photographer.I strongly recomend this product.Excelent, secure and fast sending service.

Reviews.Title: EOS 7D camera kit
Reviews.Author: Arlene
Reviews.Content: Outstanding product and service from both the reseller and Amazon. The camera has great functionality and the grip has you poised for action!
